channel.title: predictions on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in predictions on Barefoot Rob

item.title: predictions
item.description: Remote Viewing predictions 2:01am CST Tuesday 18 January 2000 I’m up late tonight reading Joe McMoneagle’s The Ultimate Time Machine in which he makes specific predictions for the next 100 years using information he gained through remote viewing. The coolest of the predictions, or the one that made my heart jump most: A solid object four inches in diameter will actually be teletransported from a point A to a point B, by the year 2050.
